CustomField.description: Used in SMART contracts. It is the kWh equivalent of the Annual Cost of Electricity (Current) field. It shows how many kWhs are included in the Current Customer Subscription kW DC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in SMART contracts. It is the kWh equivalent of the Annual Cost of Electricity (Current) field. It shows how many kWhs are included in the Current Customer Subscription kW DC.
CustomField.label: Annual kWh Subscription (Current)
